title: Dangerous Cravings
description: Homicide detective Alex's secret life as an erotica author makes her the target of a serial killer. She and her partner Cole, must find him or she'll pay for her Dangerous Cravings with her life.Publisher's Note: This book contains explicit sexual content, graphic language, and situations some readers may find objectionable: Strong BDSM theme and content, violence.
author: Evangeline Anderson
